scripts.test-dot: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter dot server/**/*.test.js

scripts.test-tap: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter tap server/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-land: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter landing server/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-x: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter xunit server/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-list: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter list server/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-jcov: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter json-cov server/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-jstream: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --reporter json-stream server/**/*.test.js
